ch.tofind.commusica.playlist

Class PlaylistManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.tofind.commusica.playlist.PlaylistManager

  • public class PlaylistManager
extends Object
    Class used to manages playlist.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addTrackToFavorites(Track track)
      Adds the given track in the Favorites playlist.

      Get the object instance.

      Removes an existing playlist.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static PlaylistManager getInstance()
        Get the object instance.
        Returns:
        The instance of the object.

      • getPlaylist

        public EphemeralPlaylist getPlaylist()
        Returns the ephemeral playlist currently playing.
        Returns:
        The ephemeral playlist currently playing.

      • createPlaylist

        public SavedPlaylist createPlaylist(String name)
        Creates a playlist with the given name as parameter. The playlist is automatically saved into the database and added to manager list.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the new playlist.
        Returns:
        The newly created playlist.

      • removePlaylist

        public void removePlaylist(SavedPlaylist playlist)
        Removes an existing playlist. The playlist is automatically removed from the database and from the manager list.
        Parameters:
        playlist - The playlist to remove.

      • getSavedPlaylists

        public List<SavedPlaylist> getSavedPlaylists()
        Returns the list of the saved playlists. Every time it is invoked, this method will ask the database the list of saved playlists.
        Returns:
        The list of the saved playlists.

      • getFavoritesPlaylist

        public SavedPlaylist getFavoritesPlaylist()
        Returns the Favorites playlist.
        Returns:
        The Favorites playlist.

      • addTrackToFavorites

        public void addTrackToFavorites(Track track)
        Adds the given track in the Favorites playlist. This method will automatically save the track passed as parameter if it is not already in the database.
        Parameters:
        track - The track to add to the Favorites playlist.

      • removeTrackFromFavorites

        public void removeTrackFromFavorites(Track track)
        Removes the given track form the Favorites playlist. This method will automatically delete the association between the track and the Favorites playlist from the database. If the currently showed playlist is the Favorites one, then the view is automatically refreshed.
        Parameters:
        track - The track to remove from the Favorites playlist.
